DOC.brief_summary: A prospective, multicenter, uncontrolled study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the Cardiapex percutaneous trans-apical access and closure system. The Cardiapex device intended for percutaneous access and closure of the left ventricular apex in conjunction with transapical Transcatheter Aortic Valve Implantation (TAVI).
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of the Cardiapex Percutaneous Trans-apical Access and Closure System
